name: Little Miss Annie
aura: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 33%.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2tums.

Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns before attacking if the target is under a [Shield] buff. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF if the target is under a [Shield] buff. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack kills an enemy. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 30% if this attack does not kill the target.

Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 25% of the target’s DEF if the target has higher DEF than this Champion. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 25% of the damage inflicted if the target has higher MAX HP than this Champion. Will repeat attack a second time if the target has both higher DEF and higher MAX HP than this Champion.

When revived, attacks the enemy that killed this Champion with the default Skill. Also fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 25% and places a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 50% of their MAX HP for 2 turns.

Each hit has a 50% chance of decreasing the target’s Turn Meter by 5% and a 50% chance of decreasing the target’s MAX HP by 5% of the damage inflicted when attacking enemies under [Heal Reduction] debuffs. Also heals this Champion by 5% of the damage inflicted when attacking enemies under [Heal Reduction] debuffs. [Will not heal from damage inflicted by Masteries]
